data.name: Cyber League Football
data.detailed_description:
Robot football at its best! Play in season mode, take on the ladder challenge, or just jump into quick-play to get in some fast action. Earn money and upgrade your robots in-game! Beware of taking too many hits, or you'll explode and find your robots laying in pieces all over the field.

Quick Play

Quickly jump into a game with any team against any other team. (Make sure you unlock all the top secret teams!) Ideal for local multiplayer games against your friends!

Season Mode

Season mode is where you'll play a whole season and try to win the playoffs. Sometimes top secret teams will be waiting for you in the championship games, if you make it that far! Beat these teams, and you'll unlock them for play in other modes. Earn money through performing well in each game, and you'll be able to buy upgrades for your team as you go.

Ladder Challenge

Work your way up the ladder to see if you can beat every team! The challenge here is that you'll must use the team you just defeated to beat the next team up on the ladder. You'll have to get used to playing with every team's specific style and use each team's custom plays in order to make it to the top!

Trophy Room

You need a place to see everything you've accomplished, so make sure to visit the trophy room. Here's where all your career achievements will be saved, for bragging rights!

data.short_description: Futuristic robot football! Upgrade your team, call the plays, and drive your robots to victory on the field.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Required
